On Monday 18 November 2002 16:27, quadzillarider wrote:
> I am using the swing test runner and want to only run one of my test
> classes not the entire Suite.  But the TestSuite holds initialization
> stuff so it must run.  Is there a way I can start the TestSuite, run
> the intialization then get to choose which test from a class I want
> to run?
>
> Thanks
>
> Kris

Can't you move that init code to the tests setUp method?
If it is used by more than one test case it could be in a base class 
for the test cases using it?
If you do not want to do that for some reason you may move the init 
code in a method and call that method in the setUp of your test class.

Does this help?

Robert
